.load lang/typecheck.dl
----

lambda{id: 5, body: 3, numParams: 1, retType: "int"}.
----

stringLit{id: 0, val: "foo"}.
intLit{id: 1, val: 2}.
----

type{id: 0, type: T}.
----
type{id: 0, type: "string"}.

type{id: 1, type: T}.
----
type{id: 1, type: "int"}.

letExpr{id: 2, bindingID: 3, bodyID: 4, varName: "x"}.
intLit{id: 3, val: 2}.
placeholder{id: 4}.
----

scopeItem{id: 4, name: N, type: T}.
----
scopeItem{id: 4, name: "x", type: "int"}.

lambda{id: 5, retType: T}.
----
lambda{body: 3, id: 5, numParams: 1, retType: "int"}.

type_lambda{id: 5, type: T}.
----
type_lambda{id: 5, type: tapp{to: "int"}}.

type{id: 5, type: T}.
----
type{id: 5, type: tapp{to: "int"}}.

scopeItem{id: 6, name: "plus", type: tapp{to: "int"}}.
funcCall{id: 6, name: "plus"}.
----

type_fc{id: 6, type: T}.
----
type_fc{id: 6, type: "int"}.

type{id: 6, type: T}.
----
type{id: 6, type: "int"}.
